name: witch radio
description:
this is a witch radio. 

it mostly picks up static but sometimes it can pick up recordings of the deep 

no cursor is shown, just move left and right to scan and listen 

---

Excerpts from Caligula, Infinite Jest, The Tempest, and various Shakespeare and re-interpretations. Words from an old project repurposed for this witch radio. 

First game with borksy and bitsy hacks. I finally figured out how it works! For some reason, the cursor won't show up, but it's barely a game, so I decided not to worry about it and get it out of my drafts. Hope you enjoy it.
